mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.member_id AS "memberId", a.member_code AS "memberCode", a.merchant_code AS "merchantCode", (a.drawAmount + a.drawFee + a.tradeFee) AS "money", a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.pt_serial_no AS "ptSerialNo", a.req_date AS "reqDate", a.resp_date AS "respDate", a.resp_type AS "respType", a.resp_code AS "respCode", a.resp_msg AS "respMsg", a.drawamount AS "drawamount", a.member_trade_rate AS "memberRate", a.drawfee AS "drawfee", a.tradefee AS "tradefee", a.settle_date AS "settleDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.name AS "member.name", b.name AS "memberName", b.mobile_phone AS "mobilePhone", o.name AS "office.name", o.parent_ids AS "office.parentIds", o.agt_grade AS "office.agtGrade", left(a.req_date,8) AS "txDate", right(a.req_date,6) AS "txTime", oi.PARENT_ID_LEVEL_1_NAME as "agentNameLevel1"

LEFT JOIN bu_member_info b ON b.id = a.member_id LEFT JOIN bu_epay_code c ON c.pay_code = b.pay_code LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = c.office_id left join v_agent_level_info oi on oi.id = c.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bu_routeway_draw( id, member_id, member_code, merchant_code, money, order_code, pt_serial_no, req_date, resp_date, resp_type, resp_code, resp_msg, drawamount, drawfee, tradefee, settle_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{memberId}, #{memberCode}, #{merchantCode}, #{money}, #{orderCode}, #{ptSerialNo}, #{reqDate}, #{respDate}, #{respType}, #{respCode}, #{respMsg}, #{drawamount}, #{drawfee}, #{tradefee}, #{settleDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bu_routeway_draw SET member_id = #{memberId}, member_code = #{memberCode}, merchant_code = #{merchantCode}, money = #{money}, order_code = #{orderCode}, pt_serial_no = #{ptSerialNo}, req_date = #{reqDate}, resp_date = #{respDate}, resp_type = #{respType}, resp_code = #{respCode}, resp_msg = #{respMsg}, drawamount = #{drawamount}, drawfee = #{drawfee}, tradefee = #{tradefee}, settle_date = #{settleDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
